page.title: 17Shopping
page.content: The main shops in Ticehurst village are found very close to the village centre. These include a grocers, greengrocers, butchers, bakers, chemist, hardware store, hairdressers, cleaners and a sub post office selling newspapers, sweets and tobacco. A second grocer is at the other end of the village. A small survey of 38 adults showed only one person never used local shops, 8 did all their main shopping in Ticehurst and the rest shopped locally but did their main shopping elsewhwere, usually Tunbridge Wells or Hastings. The two main reasons for this being the lower prices and greater choice offered by town super stores. The four people using bus used Tunbridge Wells. All other travelling was by car. Most missed is some form of take away food shop especially fish and chips.
